game.name: Papa’s Sushiria
game.description:
Known as the 13th game in the Papa Louie restaurant management series, Papa Sushiria is one the hottest and exclusively-designed free online cooking games. You have got a chance to become the head chef in this Papa new sushi restaurant. Just focus on taking the orders of your customers properly, preparing and serving the delicious sushi rolls for them. Collect the tips offered by your happy customers and use them to upgrade the restaurant and purchase new clothes. 

In this cool cooking game for girls, you as a player get a chance to slice and serve the highly scrumptious sushi around in Papa Sushiria. Papa Louie has to leave his restaurant while going on a wild-eyed mission and you have been hired to run the restaurant. You should definitely try your luck, accept the proposal and put all your efforts in becoming a master in sushi making. 

The all-in-one "Sushi Square" is prepared when it is cooked perfectly. A huge assortment of extremely delicious ingredients is there to help you top the sushi after being filled and rolled up properly. Cut the sushi into bite-size morsels to give them the finishing touches for the hungry tummies of your esteemed customers. Do not forget to bring in the bubbles. Your customers will surely enjoy taking your Bubble Tea (one of the most favorite beverages of Papa Sushiria) along with the sushi. You can use the milk to mix up the flavored teas and then come on adding the tapioca pearls or any other scrumptiously flavored bubbles. 

Why do not you initiate of sending a few coupons to your old customers with the help of your friendly mailman, Vincent! They will surely appreciate a good deal offered by you, and will soon reach the restaurant to order some more food. Coupons are most suitable for attending quests and strategically leveling up your valued customers!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Papa Sushiria at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
